title: MPK mini - Quick Reference Guide
description: This tutorial covers the basics of using the MPK mini in the Studio editing station.

title: Podcast and Voiceover Recording Using RØDECaster Pro II
description: This tutorial covers the basics of using RØDECaster Pro II to record a podcast or voiceover.

title: Audio Recording and Editing Using Software Audacity
description: This tutorial covers the basics of using the open-source software Audacity and audio interface Scarlett 18i20 in the Studio to record and edit audio.

title: Scarlett 16i16 - Audio Interface Quick Guide
description: This tutorial covers the basics of using the audio interface Scarlett 16i16 in the Studio WhisperRoom (Sound Isolation Booth).

title: Scarlett 18i20 - Audio Interface Quick Guide
description: This tutorial covers the basics of using the audio interface Scarlett 18i20 in the Studio editing station.

title: Studio LED Sign User Guide
description: This tutorial covers the basics of using the Studio LED sign and its remote.

title: Teaching with eGlass
description: This tutorial covers the basics of using eGlass for synchronous online instruction or creating videos for asynchronous learning.

title: Tips on Microphone Technique
description: This tutorial covers essential microphone techniques, including proper positioning, gain adjustment, plosive control, and using the proximity effect to enhance sound quality.
